pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:5.1: 5. The training rule on exchanging for something else
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.2: At that time the nun Thullanandā was sick.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.3: A lay follower approached her and asked,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.5: “I hope you’re bearing up, Venerable, I hope you’re getting better?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.6: “I’m not bearing up, and I’m not getting better.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.7: “We’ll deposit a _kahāpaṇa_ coin in such-and-such a shop. Whatever you wish to get from there, please have it brought to you.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.8: Thullanandā then said to a trainee nun,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.9: “Go to such-and-such a shop and bring back oil to the value of a _kahāpaṇa_.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.10: That trainee nun then brought back oil worth a _kahāpaṇa_ from that shop and gave it to Thullanandā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.12: “I don’t need oil; I need ghee.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.13: The trainee nun then returned to that shopkeeper and said,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.15: “It seems the nun doesn’t need oil, but ghee. Here’s your oil; please give me ghee.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.16: “Venerable, if we were to take back goods that have been bought, when would our goods be sold?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.17: When oil is bought, oil is taken away. Buying ghee, you receive that, and you’ll take that away.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:6.18: That trainee nun started to cry.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:7.1: and she told them what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:7.4: “How could Venerable Thullanandā get one thing in exchange and then something else?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:7.5: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:7.8: How can the nun Thullanandā get one thing in exchange and then something else?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:7.9: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:7.10: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:8.1: ‘If a nun gets one thing in exchange and then something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:11.2: apart from that thing, if she gets something else in exchange, then the effort constitutes wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:11.3: When she obtains it, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:11.4: It is to be relinquished to the Order of nuns, a group, or an individual nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:11.5: “And, monks, it’s to be relinquished in this way.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:11.6: … ‘Venerables, this thing which I got in exchange, having first got something else in exchange, is to be relinquished. I relinquish it to the Order.’ …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:12.1: If it is something else and she perceives it as something else, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:12.2: If it is something else, but she is unsure if it is, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:12.3: If it is something else, but she does not perceives it as something else, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:13.1: If it is not something else, but she perceives it as something else, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:13.2: If it is not something else, but she is unsure of it, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:13.3: If it is not something else, and she does not perceives it as something else, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:14.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np5:15.1: The fifth training rule is finished.
